reviews.review: A very interesting movie that unites all superhero fans together for an epic showdown with the Mad Titan himself. This certainly lives up to the hype that was built up for 10 years coming. The ending was a rather unexpected one but it leaves viewers with the urge to watch the sequel immediately. Will definitely watch it for another two times. To sum it up with 3 words: awesome, epic & amazing
What a waste of time. Once again huge build only be left with sense of emptiness.

This movie had it moments but not many. It was chopped up . Tried to tell way too many things. The best thing going was the fight scenes  And the best of those took place the first 20 minutes of the movie. And Hulk played the coward after getting his but handed to him. At least Thor was a bright spot.

Im going to be extremely critical of this movie because ive been waiting years for this happen..action was great fun to watch..thanos was under powered as hell but imma let that slide and wont say anything else about it...people died as expected..story was just ok..they changed alot too much in my opinion..seems like they just skimmed the comic book and did what they wanted..ending kinda annoyed me..now i have to watch a tv series about a character i dont really care about to see what gonna happen between this movie and the next..why was thanos armor only on for like 3 mins and he never donned it again..i could keep going..oh yea the story was like did peoples contracts end or something cause wtf is this mess..everyone know thanos only love is mistress death...really marvel..really...you changed his WHOLE DAMN BACKSTORY..thats the point of this mess

The movie as a whole was good, but the ending really just ruin it, there was not enough potential for the second part, they try to make a cliffhanger but there wasn't any kind suspense to follow it to the second movie, it was yours weird.
Honestly it's just kind of a bad movie. The story is pointless

What Age of Ultron and Civil War got wrong, this film got incredibly right. One would think due to the sheer volume of characters in this movie that many would be under utilised, however the director has pulled it off. 2 and a half hours of humour, action, evil and heartbreak balanced so perfectly throughout that the ending falls gracefully into place and is executed to perfection with a beautiful score to accompany. 

A very ambitious effort by the MCU, and sets up nicely for next years finale.
Now that was a great movie! What a perfect ending. Best Marvel movie yet!

I may be a superhero nerd...but this is the best piece of film I have ever seen. Of course not in the most technical of senses, but in the sheer amount of emotions I experienced watching this movie. Go and see it right now so you can talk about it with everyone at the water cooler. (Is that still a thing?)
Best avengers to date, loved it
